title: About me
body: I am a 20years old computer science student at EPITECH, in Rennes, France. My passion for programming started at the age of 15, and I decided to make it my job by joining EPITECH in 2021. This gave me the opportunity to broaden my knowledge and skills in the field of computer science, and team work. Challenges and failures do not scare me, and I am always looking for new ways to improve myself.
body2: My 5 years of experience post-EPITECH allowed me to explore various fields of programmation, from video games, to AI trained to solve video games, to web and mobile development.
body3: During my last 2 years at EPITECH, I learned to work in a team, improve my workflow and make it more industry standard with well known tools. All this while still improving by a lot my technical skills.
body4: I have done a first internship at Wildsense from July 2022 to 2023. I occupied the position of a fullstack developer/mobile developer. During those 6 months, I worked with ReactJS, NextJS, React Native and AdonisJS. I was able to polish my skills by working in a professional environment, with a highly skilled team. It is planned that I will continue to work with them as a part-time intern from September 2023 to January 2024.
body5: I am currently looking for an internship for my 3rd year at EPITECH, from February 2024 to June 2024. I am open to any kind of offer, in any kind of field of work. I am looking forward to working with you !
